adrFormatAddress: 333 E 100th St, New York, NY 10029, USA

originalText.text: My family and I have been going to Triumph PT for many years. The staff is pleasant, professional and welcoming. It's always easy to get an appointment with no hassles. The Physical Therapists are kind, respectful and very professional with great sense of humor. They are efficient and they take their time with their patients. The facility is kept well and clean. I always look forward to my appointments. Thank you for taking good care of family and me.

originalText.text:
My daughter began Physical Therapy here in 100th Street and then I changed to
location in 134th street due to my daughter's School.  The clinic is bigger than the other location but very clean just like the other.  The staff were friendly and very kind.  However, it was a blessing of God to have Mr.Berzisht as the Physical Therapist. He is very patient . Best for the kids. My daughter has perhaps been getting Physical Therapy for over two years and he never made faces or showed tiredness in treatment. He is so genuine in serving the patients.

originalText.text: This review is long overdue. I am very thankful to the staff for always being friendly, accommodating and providing the best care for me despite whichever insurance I have had. I have been a patient on and off for years now and I have referred friends and family. Berzisth is the best - he is soft spoken, polite, attentive and has an amazing bedside manner. Everything is always clean and disinfected. I definitely recommend.

originalText.text: Staff is great. Came in for shoulder issue. Had back issues for many years. Therapist diagnosed that an underlying issue was causing more aggravation than the recent immediate injury. Peter was able to help me resolve an issue I've been dealing with for decades. Go get your body right!

originalText.text: The staff was nice and my doctor did a great job. I left with little to no pain and when the pain does occur, I have the tools (exercises) to combat it.
